ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Girls just wanna have fun .....
ygData.msgSnippet: Shada-isnt the BBK 10 35? I had one for a couple of months and I m sure that s what it was- I am now using the Crys blade and sometimes hit for 36 a pop.
ygData.messageBody:
Shada-isnt the BBK 10 35? I had one for a couple of months and I'm sure
that's what it was- I am now using the Crys blade and sometimes hit for 36 a
pop. Promised myself when I hit 40 I'm gonna enlist some help camping for
the Runed Falchion- I love the look :)
Scanna Swiftsinger
38th Chorus
Bertoxx
-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <garramone@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 2:55 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Girls just wanna have fun .....


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>
>the price on crystalline blades (11 38) has come down a lot, you may be
able
>to pick one up for 600pp or a little more. it's not a bad weapon and you
>will feel like you are doing some better damage, if a bit slower. there is
>also the brazen brass kilij (11 35) which has a better ratio, but looks
like
>a normal scimitar (yuk). the short sword look of the crys blade isn't
great
>but it beats the scimitar. it's been a long time but i am fairly sure the
>crys blade is primary only, as is the claws and staff of writhing.
>
>Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L47 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>>
>> Hopefully there'll be something within my price range (which is
>> actually very low at the mo after buying the stones to get the new
>> armour!!!)
>>
